author: Amber Milne
title: UK under fire for suggesting coronavirus 'great leveller'
description: LONDON (Thomson Reuters Foundation) - The British government came under fire on social media on Thursday, accused of promoting the idea that the coronavirus was a "great leveller" hitting rich and poor alike.
content:
LONDON (Thomson Reuters Foundation) - The British government came under fire on social media on Thursday, accused of promoting the idea that the coronavirus was a “great leveller” hitting rich and poor alike.
